name: The little Spidy
description:
"The little spidy" is a first person 3D game in which you will discover a little spider named Spidy
In the beta of the game you can find 2 true endings and 1 alternative ending
Actually the beta is only availavle for Windows
In the final version you will find 20 alternative endings
Please leave a comment to suport me:D
Weekly actualization :)
